feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
